Method.name: ClearPatSession

Method.name: ClearSession

Method.name: MyXdate
Method.Implementation: Set val=$$XDATE^BEDDUTID(rawDtTm) QUIT val

Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation: Do ..OnPagePREHTML() Do ..OnPageCSPROOT() Do ..OnPagePOSTHTML() Quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: Write "<!-- BEDDEDIT1.csp - BEDD ED Edit Page -->" Write !,"<!-- ;;2.0;IHS EMERGENCY DEPT DASHBOARD;**2**;Apr 02, 2014 -->" Write !,"<!-- BEDD*2.0*2 - Changes for page navigation and log out button -->" Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,!,! Set U="^" Set duz=%session.Data("DUZ") Set site=%session.Data("SITE") Set objid=%session.Data("OBJECTID") Set dfn=%session.Data("DFN") Set %session.Data("EDVISITID")=objid Do CHKDATA^BEDDUTW(objid) Do LOADSYS^BEDDUTW(.beddsys,site) Set timeout=$G(beddsys("TimeOut")) Write !,!,"<META HTTP-EQUIV=""Refresh"" CONTENT="""_( timeout )_"; URL=BEDD.csp"">" Write !,!,"<!--BEDD*2.0*2;Added META updates-->" Write !,"<META HTTP-EQUIV=""CACHE-CONTROL"" CONTENT=""NO-CACHE"">" Write !,"<META HTTP-EQUIV=""PRAGMA"" CONTENT=""NO-CACHE"">" Write !,"<META HTTP-EQUIV=""EXPIRES"" CONTENT=""-1"">" Write !,!,"<TITLE> BEDD Edit </TITLE>",! Write !,"<script language=""JavaScript"" type=""text/javascript"">" Write !,!," window.onload = function() {",! Method.name: formSavJS
Method.Description: Called during rendering of this page to write out JavaScript code to invoke the server-side save method for form <var>form</var>.
Method.Implementation: Write " //invoke #server(csp.beddedit1.formSave())" Write !," result = "_"cspHttpServerMethod"_"('",..Encrypt($listbuild("csp.beddedit1.formSave"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""),"',1,'',objid" Write ",",!," (form.reclock == null || form.reclock == null) ? null : cspTrim(form.reclock.value)" ;%in1 Write ",",!," (form.reclockuser == null || form.reclockuser == null) ? null : cspTrim(form.reclockuser.value)" ;%in2 Write ",",!," (form.reclockdt == null || form.reclockdt == null) ? null : cspTrim(form.reclockdt.value)" ;%in3 Write ",",!," cspGetRadioValue(form.Injury)" ;%in4 Write ");",! Quit

Method.name: formSave
Method.Description: Saves the data sent from the form <var>form</var> into the specified object instance. If successful, updates the values on the form.

Method.name: formSubmit
Method.Description: Translates a submit request from form <var>form</var> into a call to <METHOD>formSave</METHOD>.
Method.Implementation: New v Set v("RecLock")=$ZSTRIP($get(%request.Data("reclock",1)),">W") Set v("RecLockUser")=$ZSTRIP($get(%request.Data("reclockuser",1)),">W") Set v("RecLockDT")=$ZSTRIP($get(%request.Data("reclockdt",1)),">W") Set v("Injury#1")=$get(%request.Data("Injury",1)) If $get(objid)="" Set objid=$get(%request.Data("OBJID",1)) Quit ..formSave(0,.errmsg,objid,v("RecLock"),v("RecLockUser"),v("RecLockDT"),v("Injury#1"))
